backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining delivery data types, storing site content, rider applications, and orders with admin‑protected initialization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a rebuild/redeploy trigger to related files, components, and test metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS root theme variables and global styles defining light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/redeploy-trigger.txt: Plain text marker indicating when a rebuild and deployment were triggered.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, React Query, theming, and route structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Admin panel for listing, creating, updating, assigning riders to orders, and uploading delivery proofs using various query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRider: Displays a table of rider profiles with basic details and assigned order counts fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Wrapper component that checks user role and blocks access to admin pages if not authorized.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the site’s logo image with brand name and tagline.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Floating WhatsApp button linking to a prefilled message for quick contact.
frontend/src/components/FounderCard.tsx: Card showing founder details with fallback avatar handling.
Section wrapper applying selectable gradient or blurred card backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, mobile menu, and call/WhatsApp CTAs.
frontend/src/components/HomeServicesCate: Displays a grid of service category cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session handling.
frontend/src/components/MapEmbed.tsx: Embeds a Google Maps iframe showing the Bikaner location.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCTAs.tsx: Renders WhatsApp and phone call CTA buttons for ordering.
frontend/src/components/ProofAndTrustSec: Shows trust features in a grid of cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/RateTable.tsx: Displays distance-based pricing in a table with formatted parcel rates.
frontend/src/components/RiderApplication: Implements a modal form for riders to apply, with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/RiderGuard.tsx: Protects rider-only pages by requiring login and showing a prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/ServiceList.tsx: Shows a list of service offering cards with icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, contact details, and CTAs.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the site’s main layout with header, footer, and floating WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/Steps.tsx: Displays a multi-step process as numbered cards with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines central contact info and provides a helper to generate WhatsApp message links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook that updates document title and meta tags for description and keywords.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating site content, rates, orders, riders, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light/dark modes including gradients and UI utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard allowing content editing, rate management, and viewing rider applications and orders via multiple panels and forms.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with call/WhatsApp options and a form that opens a prefilled WhatsApp message using a server-provided template.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring a hero section, WhatsApp booking CTA, service highlights, and various promotional sections about the delivery service.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the four-step delivery process with icons and supporting sections describing benefits and workflows.
frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx: Displays fuel-efficiency info and a dynamic table of distance‑based delivery rates fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/RiderPage.tsx: Rider dashboard to view assigned deliveries, update statuses, and upload proof photos with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services listing page showing delivery categories with metadata setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Functions to build WhatsApp message links and format Indian phone numbers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending rebuild/redeploy request.
